resp = client.synonyms.put_synonym(
    id="my-synonyms-set",
    synonyms_set=[
        {
            "id": "test-1",
            "synonyms": "hello, hi"
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.indices.create(
    index="test-index",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "filter": {
                "synonyms_filter": {
                    "type": "synonym_graph",
                    "synonyms_set": "my-synonyms-set",
                    "updateable": True
                }
            },
            "analyzer": {
                "my_index_analyzer": {
                    "type": "custom",
                    "tokenizer": "standard",
                    "filter": [
                        "lowercase"
                    ]
                },
                "my_search_analyzer": {
                    "type": "custom",
                    "tokenizer": "standard",
                    "filter": [
                        "lowercase",
                        "synonyms_filter"
                    ]
                }
            }
        }
    },
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "title": {
                "type": "text",
                "analyzer": "my_index_analyzer",
                "search_analyzer": "my_search_analyzer"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.synonyms.put_synonym(
    id="my-synonyms-set",
    synonyms_set=[
        {
            "id": "test-1",
            "synonyms": "hello, hi, howdy"
        }
    ],
)
print(resp2)
